name: Science Portal
achievements: Developed and deployed an institution-wide publication portal to centralize and simplify access to research outputs
Built a scalable web application with data mining solutions designed for multi-institutional deployment
Garnered attention from multiple institutions interested in personalized instances

name: PMATCH (Prioritizer API)
achievements: Led the design and development of a clinical trial prioritization API to help clinicians make efficient and confident treatment recommendations for their patients
Utilized patient molecular profiles to conduct a wide range of analyses to pair and prioritize the best treatments available

name: CoBE
achievements: Piloted a full overhaul of the original application to incorporate new functionalities, a refreshed UI, and robust NestJS API to address usability issues and functionality problems
Coordinated the collaboration between several different teams to maintain active and cohesive development

name: Aircheck
achievements: Led the full stack design, development, and deployment of the Aircheck web application to share analysis ready chemical screening data for ML/AI workflows to aid in drug discovery

Collaborated with partners and users from Pfizer, Bristol Myers Squibb (BMS), X-chem, Hitgen, Structural Genomics Consortium (SGC), and University of North Carolina (UNC) to work on refining core components of the web application and building new ones based on user stories
